trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo?displayProperty=fullName> instead.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
Retrieves the addresses of static functions or variables, such as those defined in a DLL.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::AddressOfMember`, see the MSDN Library.
Member ID of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> member's address to retrieve.
Specifies whether the member is a property, and if so, what kind.
On successful return, a reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> member.
Creates a new instance of a type that describes a component class (coclass).
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::CreateInstance`, see the MSDN Library.
Object which acts as the controlling <xref uid="langword_csharp_IUnknown" name="IUnknown" href=""></xref>.
The IID of the interface that the caller will use to communicate with the resulting object.
On successful return, a reference to the created object.
Retrieves the type library that contains this type description and its index within that type library.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetContainingTypeLib`, see the MSDN Library.
On successful return, a reference to the containing type library.
On successful return, a reference to the index of the type description within the containing type library.
Retrieves a description or specification of an entry point for a function in a DLL.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetDllEntry`, see the MSDN Library.
ID of the member function whose DLL entry description is to be returned.
Specifies the kind of member identified by `memid`.

If not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the function sets `pBstrDllName` to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_BSTR" name="BSTR" href=""></xref> that contains the name of the DLL.

If not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the function sets `lpbstrName` to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_BSTR" name="BSTR" href=""></xref> that contains the name of the entry point.
If not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, and the function is defined by an ordinal, then `lpwOrdinal` is set to point to the ordinal.
Retrieves the documentation string, the complete Help file name and path, and the context ID for the Help topic for a specified type description.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetDocumentation`, see the MSDN Library.
ID of the member whose documentation is to be returned.
On successful return, the name of the item method.
On successful return, the documentation string for the specified item.
On successful return, a reference to the Help context associated with the specified item.
On successful return, the fully qualified name of the Help file.
Retrieves the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCDESC"></xref> structure that contains information about a specified function.
The values of `ppFuncDesc` can be accessed through <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetFuncDesc`, see the MSDN Library.
Index of the function description to return.
Reference to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_FUNCDESC" name="FUNCDESC" href=""></xref> that describes the specified function.
Maps between member names and member IDs, and parameter names and parameter IDs.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
On succesful return, an array of names to map.
Count of names to map.
Reference to an array in which name mappings are placed.
Retrieves the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IMPLTYPEFLAGS"></xref> value for one implemented interface or base interface in a type description.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetImplTypeFlags`, see the MSDN Library.
Index of the implemented interface or base interface.
On successful return, a reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IMPLTYPEFLAGS" name="IMPLTYPEFLAGS" href=""></xref> enumeration.
Retrieves marshaling information.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetMops`, see the MSDN Library.
The member ID that indicates which marshaling information is needed.

A reference to the opcode string used in marshaling the fields of the structure described by the referenced type description, or returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no information to return.
Retrieves the variable with the specified member ID (or the name of the property or method and its parameters) that correspond to the specified function ID.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetNames`, see the MSDN Library.
The ID of the member whose name (or names) is to be returned.
On succesful return, contains the name (or names) associated with the member.
Length of the `rgBstrNames` array.
On succesful return, the number of names in the `rgBstrNames` array.
If a type description references other type descriptions, it retrieves the referenced type descriptions.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetRefTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
Handle to the referenced type description to return.
On successful return, the referenced type description.
If a type description describes a COM class, it retrieves the type description of the implemented interface types.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetRefTypeOfImplType`, see the MSDN Library.
Index of the implemented type whose handle is returned.
Reference to a handle for the implemented interface.
Retrieves a <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPEATTR"></xref> structure that contains the attributes of the type description.
The values of `ppTypeAttr` can be accessed through <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetTypeAttr`, see the MSDN Library.
On successful return, a reference to the structure that contains the attributes of this type description.
Retrieves the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeComp" name="ITypeComp" href=""></xref> interface for the type description, which enables a client compiler to bind to the type description's members.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetTypeComp`, see the MSDN Library.
On successful return, a reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeComp" name="UCOMITypeComp" href=""></xref> of the containing type library.
Retrieves a <xref uid="langword_csharp_VARDESC" name="VARDESC" href=""></xref> structure that describes the specified variable.
The values of `ppVarDesc` can be accessed through <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::GetVarDesc`, see the MSDN Library.
Index of the variable description to return.
On successful return, a reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_VARDESC" name="VARDESC" href=""></xref> that describes the specified variable.
Invokes a method, or accesses a property of an object, that implements the interface described by the type description.
The values of `pDispParams` can be accessed through <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>.
Valid values for `wFlags` are: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |DISPATCH_METHOD|The member is accessed as a method.

If there is ambiguity, both this and the `DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET` flag can be set.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET|The member is retrieved as a property or data member.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT|The member is changed as a property or data member.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF|The member is changed by using a reference assignment, rather than a value assignment.
This value is only valid when the property accepts a reference to an object.| For additional information about `ITypeInfo::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
Reference to the interface described by this type description.
Identifies the interface member.
Flags describing the context of the invoke call.
Reference to a structure that contains an array of arguments, an array of DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts of the number of elements in each array.
Reference to the location at which the result is to be stored.

If `wFlags` specifies <xref uid="langword_csharp_DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT" name="DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF" name="DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF" href=""></xref>, `pVarResult` is ignored.
Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no result is desired.
Points to an exception information structure, which is filled in only if <xref uid="langword_csharp_DISP_E_EXCEPTION" name="DISP_E_EXCEPTION" href=""></xref> is returned.

If <xref uid="langword_csharp_Invoke" name="Invoke" href=""></xref> returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_DISP_E_TYPEMISMATCH" name="DISP_E_TYPEMISMATCH" href=""></xref>, `puArgErr` indicates the index within `rgvarg` of the argument with incorrect type.
If more than one argument returns an error, `puArgErr` indicates only the first argument with an error.
Releases a <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCDESC"></xref> previously returned by <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeInfo.GetFuncDesc*>.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::ReleaseFuncDesc`, see the MSDN Library.
Reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FUNCDESC" name="FUNCDESC" href=""></xref> to release.
Releases a <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPEATTR"></xref> previously returned by <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeInfo.GetTypeAttr*>.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::ReleaseTypeAttr`, see the MSDN Library.
Reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TYPEATTR" name="TYPEATTR" href=""></xref> to release.
Releases a <xref uid="langword_csharp_VARDESC" name="VARDESC" href=""></xref> previously returned by <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeInfo.GetVarDesc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
For additional information about `ITypeInfo::ReleaseVarDesc`, see the MSDN Library.
Reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_VARDESC" name="VARDESC" href=""></xref> to release.
